Articles.Content:
Where can I find a base building contract pack. Or are base building contracts already installed with Kerbal Attachment System?

I took a look at Contract Pack: Tourism Plus, but I don't really like doing tourism contracts.

Well I was looking for some contract pack like this and I havent' found one. And I really doubt KAS adds contracts because I havent seen any different contract. I'll take a look how these are created I think maybe i can make it

I think I'm gonna make it here is the [dev thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124301-WIP-Contract-Pack-Base-Construction)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T23:38:30Z" title="06/04/2015 11:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by CosmoBro**
